item.title: TGMN Promods Canada Epx RC v5.8 ATS
item.description:
TGMN Promods Canada Epx RC v5.8 ATS

Changelog 1.50-5.8
Fixes bad corrupted file it will show now in the mod manager

TGMN Promods Ats Expansion Road connection.
NOTE: Do not use TGMN PM RC with this it will cause issues



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: CAT 3406E Sound & Engine Pack (G5) v1.2.1 ATS
item.description:
CAT 3406E Sound & Engine Pack (G5) v1.2.1 ATS

Presenting the CAT 3406B Sound & Engine Pack! Experience the authentic sounds captured from a Kenworth W900A, equipped with the iconic 425HP mechanical CAT 3406B engine and 6″ exhaust pipes. This pack ensures a true-to-life auditory experience, professionally recorded for maximum realism.
Precision Crafted Engine Sounds: Immerse yourself in hundreds of sound samples, each capturing distinct elements from the engine, intake, and exhaust, including the 2-stage Jacobs Brake.
Full RPM Spectrum: Delight in the richness of every rev with our expansive engine recordings recorded at every 100RPM.
Engines: Includes the 310, 350, 400, 425, 465 and 500HP engines, all handcrafted by David Steele with realistic torque-curves.
Compatibility: Works with any truck if you use the Zeemods Def Generator. Out of the box it supports all default trucks, and over 80 modded ones.
Convoy Ready: Join your crew with confidence, knowing your sound will stand out.
ZAF Ready.
Bonus Features: Exclusive Zeemod’s “In Sound We Trust” digital air fresheners.
Works with: ATS 1.50



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Western Star 4800 v4.0 ATS
item.description:
Western Star 4800 v4.0 ATS

Features:
– Standalone
– 4 cabs
– 4 chassis
– 35 engines + own sounds
– 4 interiors: Exclusive, Standard
– 12, 18 speed transmissions
– Working cables
– Interiors animations
– Tuning parts
– Cabin accessories

Tested on ATS 1.50

To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Sound & Engine Pack v1.4 ETS2
item.description:
Sound & Engine Pack v1.4 ETS2

The full range of engine revolutions is recorded.
Full soundtrack of the exterior and interior.

Its engines are for stock Scania S&R 2016 and R&S, as well as Scania R&S from RJL, Scania T, P, G from RJL, Volvo, DAF 105, DAF Euro 6 and DAF 2021.
The archive contains sound sets for different cars. Choose the one you need and connect it.

– Added dynamic acoustic effects;
– Unlocked for editing;
– Compatibility update for v1.50



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: GlassStickers for your Truck v1.7 ETS2
item.description:
GlassStickers for your Truck v1.7 ETS2

Different sticker options
Two location options
All default trucks are supported

DAF XF, DAF XG+, DAF XF Euro6, IVECO HIWAY, IVECO STRALIS, MAN TGX, MAN TG3, MERCEDES ACTROS 2009, MERCEDES ACTROS 2014, Mercedes Actros 2019, RENAULT MAGNUM, RENAULT PREMIUM, RENAULT T, SCANIA RCAB 2009, SCANIA STREAMLINE, SCANIA NEW R, SCANIA NEW S, VOLVO FH 2009, VOLVO FH 2012, MAN E6, DAF 2021.

For v1.50
